resources.string: Powered by the GOA Department of Internet Ministries

The DCS Service Book App contains the daily services, both the fixed and movable parts, in Greek and in English.\n\n This is developed and maintained by the Department of Internet Ministries of the Greek Orthodox Archdiocese of America

We only collect personally identifiable information in the Users view which you choose to give us. You can delete that information at any time by deleting it in the app. We collect non-personally identifiable information through third party services, such as Google Firebase.
 
Google Firebase
 
We use Firebase Analytics to collect app usage statistics. 
We use these statistics to improve the performance and design of the Service Book App ("the App").
 Firebase uses an app-instance identifier to identify a unique installation of the App.
 
 The data collected through Firebase includes
 - session duration
 - operating system
 - device model
 - geography
 - app opens
 - app view opens
 
 Changes
 
 We reserve the right to change, modify, or amend this Privacy Policy at any time.
